title: Devourer
summaries: The Devourer is a large worm-type enemy that spawns in The Corruption, though it is less common than the abundant Eater of Souls. Like other worms, it attacks by burrowing through blocks to reach the player.
The Devourer requires 25 kills to be awarded completion of its <linked>Bestiary</linked> entry and corresponding banner, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.

statistics.Environment: The Corruption Underground Corruption
statistics.Max Life: 100/200›220/300›330
